pages.title: Stratine
pages.text: This very heavy ore is scattered around the depths of the Nether.$(br)It's probably not the best idea to carry large amounts of it home at once.

pages.title: Stratine Gem
pages.text: Rarely can one carve an intact stone. It can be used in recipes for which the Fragments were simply too small. Though with effort you can merge those together.

pages.title: Stratine Floatblock
pages.text: Stratine - as you may have already noticed - is an exceptionally heavy material. And difficult to shape, too. Even the blazing heat of the Nether could not harm the material.$(br2)However, shaping it via your $(l:general/pedestal)Pedestal$() should not be a problem whatsoever.
雷雨是大自然力量的有力标志。$(br)有了$(l:general/fusion_shrine)融合神殿$()，你甚至可以在制造一些强大资源时启动它们。$(br2)毫无疑问，我们在这里发现了一些与颜料的魔力有关的东西。
pages.title: 雷暴

pages.text: 在被雷击的地面上，你发现这些石头由于固有的静电而在你的手上振动。$(br)在$(l:general/fusion_shrine)融合神殿$()中使用，你可以用它们召唤雷雨。$(br2)$(italic)由于其挥发性，它们对爆炸反应不太好。。。
